content: **drops crochet bag in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measures** approx 30 cm / 11 3/4 in diameter **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 250 g col no 14 charcoal gray 100 g color no 46 light gray 50 g color no 02 black drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm / us 7 or the size needed to obtain the correct crochet gauge
